select ai.content_id contentId, ai.title title, ai.addr1 addr1, ai.addr2 addr2, ai.first_image firstImage, ai.first_image2 firstImage2, ai.latitude latitude, ai.longitude longitude, ai.readcount readCount, ai.like_count likeCount, ad.overview overview from attraction_description ad inner join attraction_info ai on ad.content_id = ai.content_id limit 100

select ai.content_id contentId, ai.title title, ai.addr1 addr1, ai.addr2 addr2, ai.first_image firstImage, ai.first_image2 firstImage2, ai.latitude latitude, ai.longitude longitude, ai.readcount readCount, ai.like_count likeCount, ad.overview overview from attraction_description ad inner join attraction_info ai on ai.content_id = ad.content_id order by ai.readcount desc limit 4;

select ai.content_id contentId, ai.title title, ai.addr1 addr1, ai.addr2 addr2, ai.first_image firstImage, ai.first_image2 firstImage2, ai.latitude latitude, ai.longitude longitude, ai.readcount readCount, ai.like_count likeCount, ad.overview overview from attraction_description ad inner join attraction_info ai on ad.content_id = ai.content_id WHERE addr1 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTitle},'%') limit 100

select ai.content_id contentId, ai.title title, ai.addr1 addr1, ai.addr2 addr2, ai.first_image firstImage, ai.first_image2 firstImage2, ai.latitude latitude, ai.longitude longitude, ai.readcount readCount, ai.like_count likeCount, ad.overview overview from attraction_description ad inner join attraction_info ai on ad.content_id = ai.content_id WHERE ai.content_id = #{contentId}
mapper.delete: delete from favorite where user_id = #{userId} and content_id = #{contentId};
mapper.select: select ai.content_id contentId, ai.title title, ai.addr1 addr1, ai.addr2 addr2, ai.first_image firstImage, ai.first_image2 firstImage2, ai.latitude latitude, ai.longitude longitude, ai.readcount readCount, ai.like_count likeCount, ad.overview overview, f.name name from attraction_description ad inner join attraction_info ai on ad.content_id = ai.content_id inner join favorite f on f.content_id = ai.content_id where ai.content_id in (select content_id from favorite where user_id=#{userId}) and f.user_id=#{userId}
